emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, clockwise: Dr. G. V. McCausland, Dr. R. L. Kinchloe, Dr. and Mrs. A. L. Pierce, G.H. Porson, Mable Holmes, Anne Turner, Charles H. Foggie, Madeline Sharpe Foggie, and Charlene Foggie; standing: James A. Jordon, Marion Bond Jordon, and Rev. LeRoy Patrick, gathered around banquet table in Wesley Center AME Zion Church, with Patricia Prattis Jennings on piano, for Rev. Foggie appreciation banquet, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 21, 1961, pg. 20 reads: "Guest Table - When the nurses of Wesley Center AME Zion Church sponsored a brilliant "appreciation banquet" in honor of the pastor of 17 years, the Rev. Charles H. Foggie, recently, the special guest table included Dr. G.V. McCausland and Dr. R. L. Kinchloe of the Council of Churches; Dr. and Mrs. A.L. Pierce of the Allegheny Conference; G.H. Porson, chairman of the board of trustees of Wesley Center; Mrs. Mable Holmes, host president; Mrs. Anne Turner, mistress of ceremonies; Dr. and Mrs. C.H. Foggie and daughter, Charlene, seated around the table. Standing, left to right: Councilman and Mrs. James A. Jordon and the Rev. LeRoy Patrick, moderator of the Pittsburgh Presbytery. - Harris Photo."
